title: IDmag 1 - Information Overload
description:

This first edition about information overload, deals with the way we humans percept and interpret information - and therefore also on how You as a designer of information can reach your target audience better. It's also about how society is changing, and whereto - and how You can use this in business. 

Because I am a curious (and impatient) human being, the thoughts on these pages are sort of a pop-semi-scientific-theoretical-praktical-none-or-the-other-litterature.
